mapper.select: SELECT R.FB_TOTAL , R.FB_WIN , R.FB_DRAW , R.BB_TOTAL , R.BB_WIN , R.BB_DRAW , R.PP_TOTAL , R.PP_WIN , R.PP_DRAW , R.BL_TOTAL , R.BL_WIN , R.BL_DRAW FROM PLAYER P, RECORD R WHERE P.RECORD_ID=R.RECORD_ID AND P.USER_ID=#{user_Id}
SELECT G.LOCATION , G.GROUND_NAME , G.GROUND_OWN , G.GROUND_PHONE , G.GROUND_ADDRESS FROM GROUNDS G, GAMES GA WHERE GA.WINNER_ID=#{user_Id}
